title: Pôr do Sol
overview: Love, passion, mystery, and betrayal make the days of the herdade do Pôr do SolThe Bourbon de Linhaça family, known in Santarem as one of the most influential families in living memory, owns the Pôr do Sol estate, rich in the best quality cherries and horses that are world racing champions.But all is not roses and misfortunes begin to knock at the door of the Flaxseed Bourbons. The black sheep of the family, the engineer's calculating and shady brother, devises several plans to end the hegemony of the family patriarch, while, from the past, a lost daughter emerges, the result of a torrid romance between the owner of the house and the caretaker, who will shake the foundations of this estate, putting everything and everyone at stake.
